title: GitHub Issue Schema
description: Schema for converting user stories to GitHub issues

title.description: The title of the GitHub issue

body.description: The body/description of the issue in markdown format

labels.description: Labels to apply to the issue. Only use these standard labels: enhancement, bug, documentation, duplicate, good first issue, help wanted, invalid, question, wontfix

issue_type.description: The type of issue: Bug, Feature, or Task

assignees.description: GitHub usernames to assign to the issue

milestone.description: Milestone number to add the issue to

project_id.description: GitHub project ID to link the issue to (if available)

examples.title: Implement news ingestion pipeline
examples.body:
## User Story

As a content editor, I want to ingest news articles from multiple sources so that I can manage and publish content efficiently.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Support RSS feed ingestion
- [ ] Support API-based ingestion
- [ ] Store articles in database
- [ ] Handle duplicate detection

## Technical Notes

- Use Celery for async processing
- Implement rate limiting
- Add monitoring and logging
